VideoItem.Title: Introduction to TraceLab
VideoItem.Description: Provides a general description of TraceLab and an explanation of its main User Interface elements.

VideoItem.Title: How to Create an Experiment - Part 1
VideoItem.Description: Explanation of important Traceability concepts necessary to replicate the Vector Space Model experiment provided by default with TraceLab.

VideoItem.Title: How to Create an Experiment - Part 2
VideoItem.Description: Process of creating a new experiment in TraceLab, including how to interact with the Components Library and adding your first component to the experiment.

VideoItem.Title: How to Create an Experiment - Part 3
VideoItem.Description: Completion of the Vector Space Model Experiment replica by adding all missing components and executing the complete experiment for results visualization.

VideoItem.Title: How to Create a Component
VideoItem.Description: Describes in great detail the process of creating a component for TraceLab using Visual Studio.

VideoItem.Title: Perforce - Branching and Source Control Bindings
VideoItem.Description: Describes the process of creating your own TraceLab branch from the 'dev' folder and also how to fix the Perforce source control bindings in Visual Studio.

LinkItem.Title: Wiki
LinkItem.Description: Extensive documentation of TraceLab including experiment creation, component/datatype development and TraceLab framework architecture.

LinkItem.Title: Discussion Forum
LinkItem.Description: Online site where users and developers can post messages and discuss topics related to TraceLab.

LinkItem.Title: Issue Tracker / Bug Reporting
LinkItem.Description: Site that manages and mantains a list of issues regarding TraceLab framework and components.

LinkItem.Title: COEST
LinkItem.Description: Overview of the Center of Excellence for Software Traceability and its ongoing projects (including TraceLab).
